summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style Video Editor - All requested features working correctly. Dashboard loads with all feature tiles, project creation navigates to Editor, KI-Assistent chat interface works, all AI feature panels (Text-to-Video, Musik-Generator, Sprachausgabe/TTS, Auto-Untertitel) open correctly with proper UI elements, and Export dialog shows all resolution/format options.

integration_issues.issue: Initial click on 'Erstellen' button using text selector doesn't trigger form submission. Need to use button[type='submit'] selector for reliable submission.

passed_tests: Dashboard loads correctly with all feature tiles visible

Feature Tiles visible: KI-Model (NEU), Text-zu-Video (AI), Auto-Untertitel, Sprachausgabe (TTS), Musik-Generator (AI), Hintergrund entf., Effekte & Filter, Übergänge, Audio Mixer, Bild-Generator, Mehr KI-Tools
New Project Modal opens with Projektname, Auflösung (720p/1080p/4K), Bildfrequenz (24/25/30/60 FPS) options
Project creation navigates to Editor view successfully
Editor Layout loads with: Top Toolbar, Left Sidebar (Importieren, Medien, KI-Medien, etc.), Media Panel, Preview Area, Timeline, Right Panel (Eigenschaften/KI-Assistent tabs)
Text-to-Video Panel opens with: KI-Modell selector (GPT-5.2), Video-Beschreibung textarea, Stil dropdown (Filmisch), Dauer input (30s), Format dropdown (16:9 YouTube), Storyboard generieren button
Musik-Generator Panel opens with: Beschreibung input, Genre dropdown (Electronic), Stimmung dropdown (Upbeat), Dauer slider (30s), Musik-Vorschlag generieren button
Sprachausgabe (TTS) Panel opens with: Text zum Vorlesen textarea, Stimme dropdown (Alloy Neutral), Geschwindigkeit slider (1.0x), Vorschau button, Audio erstellen button

Auto-Untertitel Panel opens with: Audio/Video hochladen button, KI-Modell selector (GPT-5.2), Sprache dropdown (Deutsch), Untertitel-Stil options (Standard/YouTube/Netflix/Modern/Minimal/Highlight), Untertitel generieren button
KI-Assistent tab in Editor loads with: Chat interface, GPT-5.2 model selector, Welcome message, Quick suggestions, Chat input, Send button

Export Dialog opens with: Resolution options (480p/720p/1080p/1440p/4K/8K), FPS options (24/25/30/50/60), Format options (MP4/MOV/WebM/GIF), Codec options (H.264/H.265), Quality slider, Exportieren button
critical_code_review_comments: App designed for Electron but works in browser mode with localStorage fallback for project storage
AI API calls use Emergent LLM Key (sk-emergent-...) - configured and ready for use
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
German language UI throughout the application
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working: Dashboard with feature tiles, project creation to Editor navigation, KI-Assistent chat in Editor, Text-to-Video/Musik-Generator/Sprachausgabe/Auto-Untertitel panels from Dashboard, Export dialog with resolution options. The app runs in browser mode using localStorage for project storage. To navigate to Editor, create a new project using the 'Neues Projekt erstellen' button and click 'Erstellen'. Use button[type='submit'] selector for reliable form submission.
